title: Sherlock Holmes: A Few Interesting Cases
description: Arthur Conan Doyle has some very good stories that are important to know the universe of Sherlock Holmes, and yet, some of these stories have been usually overlooked. This is a selection of the following cases: The Devilâ€™s Foot, The Three Gables, The Blanched Soldier, The Lion's Mane, The Retired Colourman, The Veiled Lodger, and The Case of Shoscombe Old Place.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle
